item.title: Report X-2025041099
item.description:
Report X-2025041099

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-05
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WENT TO CALL FOR A LEAKER IN PACKAGE CAR. BROUGHT BAG WITH LEAKING BOX BACK WITH NOXIOUS SMELLING PACKAGE WITH NO MARKINGS IN SPILL TUB AND PLACED ON SHELF. UPON SMELLING THE NOXIOUS SMELL, INVESTIGATED THE PACKAGE. MOVED PACKAGE TO HOOD TO HELP REDUCE NOXIOUS SMELL. PACKAGE WAS UNOPENED AND CONTENTS NOT IDENTIFIED ON THE SERVICE CROSS. DONNED PPE PER UNKNOWN BOX RESPONSE SHEET INCLUDING SILVER SHIELD LIVERS AND OPENED PACKAGE. UPON OPENING DISCOVERED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS UNDECLARED HAZMAT UN1133 ADHESIVE WITH FLAMMABLE LIQUID.

item.title: Report E-2025040032
item.description:
Report E-2025040032

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-28
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 28, 2025, two (2) 2.64-quart jugs of UN3266 were damaged and released approximately one (1) quart of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized soda ash, absorbents, and hand tools to clean the dock floor. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 15-gallon drum and the damaged jugs were placed in one (1) 5-gallon pail for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025040454
item.description:
Report X-2025040454

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WENT TO DOOR 37 WITH PPE ON AND THEN FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. LEAKING PACKAGE WAS BOUGHT BACK TO PSC AND THE SOURCE OF THE LEAKER INSIDE WAS MOROCCAN OIL. BUT THE PACKAGE WAS MIXED MERCHANDISE INCLUDING AN AEROSOL CAN OF AMIKA RISING STAR FINISHING HAIR SPRAY. PACKAGE BOX HAD NO LIMITED QUANTITY LABEL VISABLE ON THE BOX. RESPONDER NOTIFIED RMP ABOUT THIS SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT PACKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2025040453
item.description:
Report X-2025040453

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-25
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED AT DOOR 33 WITH P.P.E. ON AND ENTER THE TRAILER TO FIND A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPIATE RESPONSE SHEET. LEAKING PACKAGE WAS BOUGHT BACK TO THE P.S.C. UPON EXAMINING THE CONTENT INSIDE THE PACKAGE. AN AEROSOL CAN WAS FOUND INSIDE AND NO HAZARD LABEL WERE FOUND ON THE PACKAGE BOX. BESIDES THE LEAKING DETERGENT PRODUCT ALSO FOUND INSIDE THE PACKAGE. AEROSOLS, NON-FLAMMABLE, DAMAGE INSPCTION; NON REGULATED LEAKER; NO LEAK TO AEROSOL.

  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO UNLOAD FOR LEAKER. AFFECTED PACKAGE FOUND TO CONTAIN AEROSOLS BUT HAS NO LIMITED QUANTITY OR HAZARDOUS MATERIALS MARKINGS. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCEDURE ACTIVATED. AEROSOLS, FLAMMABLE / AEROSOLS, NON-FLAMMABLE; DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON REGULATED PRODUCT LEAKED; NO LEAK TO AEROSOLS.

item.title: Report X-2025040093
item.description:
Report X-2025040093

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: NON-DG (COMBUSTIBLE LIQUID) DPF CLEAN LEAKED. DG PERMATEX ADHESIVE DID NOT LEAK. ADHESIVES - ONE INNER BOX WITH A GROUND LTD QTY MARK. INSIDE THIS BOX CONTAINS 12 X 4 OZ CONTAINERS OF PERMATEX THREAD SEALANT WITH PTFE 80632.

item.title: Report X-2025040089
item.description:
Report X-2025040089

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-20
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE LEAKING ON ROUTE BY THE DRIVER WHILE DELIVERING. IT WAS CONTAINED IN A PLASTIC BAG AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE BUILDING. PACKAGE WAS INSPSECTED AND AN SDS CHECKED, WHICH REVEALED THE CONTENTS TO BE REGULATED MATERIAL SHIPPED IN AN AMOUNT QUALIFYING FOR LIMITED QUANTY. HOWEVER, PACKAGING HAS NO HAZMAT MARKS OR LABELS. PACKAGING IS A PLASTIC ENVELOPED AS OPPOSED TO A STURDY BOX REQUIRED FOR LIMITED QUANTITY SHIPMENTS. HAZMAT SUPPORT DESK WAS CALLED TO INITIATE THE UNDECLARED SHIPMENT PROCEDURES.

item.title: Report X-2025040091
item.description:
Report X-2025040091

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: EMPLOYEE NOTICED BOXES ON IRREG BELT WITH LABELING THAT INDICATED THEY CONTAINED LITHIUM ION BATTERIES BASED ON PREVIOUS INSTANCES WITH SIMILAR BOXES. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT POLICY IMPLEMENTED. LITHIUM ION BATTERIES; ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1Z9X34F1A838860657
